name: Santa's Eve
description:
Oh no! One of Santa's elves is busy, and he needs to deliver all of his presents by Christmas Day. You come to the rescue, and offer to help Santa. He accepts!

  • When you are flying the sleigh, click/tap at the right time to drop a gift down the chimney.
  • You will get a positive score if you get the gift into the chimney, and a negative score if you miss.

Made by Dylan Mair 2022
